events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th at 5 PM involving their vehicle and a streetlamp.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the initial description mentioning vehicle collision.
An agent with experience in auto accident claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and processing.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgment to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident report.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with claim evaluation.
Customer provided all requested supporting documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair quotes.
The assigned agent began detailed investigation of the accident circumstances and reviewed submitted documents.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault and damage is covered under policy.
A fair settlement offer has been proposed that covers the full repair cost of the vehicle as per estimates.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process.
The claim approval was finalized, confirming that the settlement offer will be honored and payment processed.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer's account for the approved amount to cover vehicle repairs.
The claim case has been officially closed following payment and customer confirmation of repair commencement.
All claim files and documentation were archived in the system for future reference according to policy.
